entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net 8 AOT Published files Windows run with environment variable do not work #107227
  • Secondary frame stackoverflow test failure on linux #107226
  • CS0234 is incorrectly detected during the compilation of Razor files in Blazor. #107223
  • HashSet<string> breaks if copied from one using non-singleton default equality comparer #107222

Closed

  • Oo #107228
  • Inefficient code gen when switching from direct array to Span<T> or Memory<T> #107181

PullRequests

Created

  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make `DomainAssembly` create its `Assembly` in its constructor and remove separate allocate load level #107224
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Merged

  • Pass $(crossArg) to src/tests/build.sh in Antigen/Fuzzlyn pipelines #107229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    area-Build-mono
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Handle exceptional cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2528534 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test coverage for DirectoryServices.TransformControls #107201
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASI][draft] UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute on the API surface #107185
    api-needs-work, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix encoding for certain k-mask instructions #107210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid combining conditional select for reduction instrinsics #107207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106340
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Respect JitEnableOptionalRelocs in TryReserveInitialMemory #107059
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add TypeNameFuzzer #107206
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Remove PointerNativeTypeAssignmentRewriter by introducing a separate local with the exact type and assigning to/from it #107219
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • error MSB3030: (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) Could not copy the file #42964
  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • Getting System.NullReferenceException when running `dotnet tool update -g --all` #42598
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • [dotnet format] Different whitespace errors reported by --verify-no-changes when using indent_style = tab #43098
  • Movement of clauses in an inheritance #43095
  • InternalsVisibleTo PublicKey does not respect variables in NET5 Preview SDK #13289
  • `dotnet test` fails for Norwegian resources on Ubuntu 20.04 #12139
    Backlog
  • publish self-contained app isn't working #40510
  • Transitive project references missing aliases #2454
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.1.24413.1] Failed to execute command "dotnet watch run" with error "Hot Reload based watching is only supported in .NET 6.0 or newer apps" #42748
  • EmbeddedResource Include doesn't include path on linux. #24458
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Improve Up to date check logic #43156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issues with Blazor WASM delta applier #43152
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [StaticWebAssets] Improve Up to date check logic #43100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add ProjectInfo.WithId #74665
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35230.56 #74964

Updated

  • [API Proposal]: `Concat` support for `IncrementalValuesProvider<T>` #74585
    17.13
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Replace `.Where(x => x is T)` for `.OfType<T>()` #74968

PullRequests

Created

  • Filter type parameters in where clause #74970
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial properties: duplicate `membersByName` before merging accessors #74969
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Remove usages of `#if CODE_STYLE` where possible. #74958
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add NFW tracking to Solution.RemoveProjectReference #74965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add ProjectInfo.WithId public API #74664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Use ignore case to fix analyzer reloading in devkit #74963
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve support for TypeLibFuncFlags.FHidden attributed properties. #74962
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #57640
  • Perf improvement: json #57639
  • Memory leak in my .NET 6 Web API running in docker container in AWS #57638
  • HttpGet [FromQuery] Model binding fails in case of propertity with the same name #57637
  • JwtBearerHandler should trigger OnAuthenticationFailed event, even when there is no Token in Authorization header #57636
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/6.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #57633
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #57631
  • [Blazor] Page components may receive query parameter values from the next URL getting navigated to #57627

Closed

  • Perf improvement: https #57634
  • Error JWT Token #57635

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update Selenium version in Versions.props #57625
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57561
    area-networking
  • Verify project template dependencies #57560
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme doesn't change on changing UserAppTheme #24558
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Overriding OnKeyUp in MainActivity does not capture keyboard presses #24557
  • Shell navigation back is not working after update 2 pages 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls' and 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility' #24555
  • xcrun -find bitcode_strip is running every time I deploy locally to an iPad #24552

Closed

  • Shell Tab icons on android do not show if a page is set to visible and navigated to immediately after. #23780
    Backlog
  • Shell Tabs on Android are sometimes not visually removed from view when IsVisible is set to false. #23717
    Backlog
  • Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #8788
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme change on changing UserAppTheme #24559
    area-theme
  • Avoid recomputing bindings multiple times and bind BindingContext first #24553
    community ✨

Merged

  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    area-controls-shell, community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24523
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support TransactionScope in IExecutionStrategy extensions #34586
  • SQL Query Translation for !string.IsNullOrEmpty(MAPPED_DB_FIELD) Condition #34585

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Generate correct calls for complex and primitive properties in the model snapshot #34587
    tell-mode

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Map directly to JSON id for types converted to string #34577

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Acquire the migrations database lock in a transaction. #34489
    providers-beware, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34581
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #34497
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34572
